User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Create a new web worker: var worker = new Worker('aworker.js')  then change the 'aworker.js' script and reload the page.  The change to aworker.js is not detected.


Actual results:

The change to the worker's javascript file is not detected. In fact, the web console shows it grabbing the 'aworker.js' file from the server on first use - but on reload, it doesn't re-appear in the log as even checking for that file again.


Expected results:

The updated aworker.js file should be loaded instead of the older version.  Tested in both Safari and Chrome - both reload the changed javascript file.
